A Facebook live shooting just took place involving #SeanReed AKA #SeanDaDon , it seemed Sean was in a police chase. He left his vehicle and began running on foot. By the video itâ€™s clear he was tased and hit the ground. A couple seconds later over 15 shots are fired and Sean was killed. This video is the end of his livestream, where an unidentied cop picks up the phone while hiding his face. Not only did he stop the recording but he deleted the video off Seans Facebook. He was clearly not aware many were screen recording the incident. I believe this took place In #indianapolis . The question is why was he shot so many times after being tased and already on the ground? Did he have a firearm? Whatâ€™s the justification for these harsh actions? Care to fill us in @indianapolispolice ?  #fortworthtexas #fortworthtx #indianapolisindiana #indianapolispolice @impd_news 
#IMPD #seandadon #RIH #SeanReed  While the world only has to deal with the CORONAVIRUS. Black people still have to deal with #Racism and #PoliceBrutality. Smh The attack on our people never stops.

They are nothing more then bullies. Most of them are racist. Joining the police allows them the power they want over the people they hate. They get a license to kill and traumatizes our people. THE POLICE ARE THE BIGGEST ORGANIZED GANG.

I dont know if the answer is more BLACK cops especially when they hurt us worse.
